Name: Valora Survival
About the game: About Survival: Year is 2020, something transformed almost the entire humanity in Zombies, you escaped on an island to survive alone. Everything is going fine until you find a weird cave, you enter that cave, big mistake. You need to fight enemies, parkour, find lore and find the cure to save the world BUT WAIT! there is a crazy doctor that wants to kill you. If you survive, that's it, get the cure and save the world. After you get the cure everything starts buring, there is no way out, this is the end... suddenly the doctor came back and helped. You both get in rocket and fly away. About Multiplayer FPS Shooter: if you get bored of survival you can play Multiplayer FPS Shooter Mode Play to learn Money to get skins and guns. The Game doesn't have in-app purchases Have Fun!
